mapper.insert:
/* IMCmmnDtMapper.insert */ INSERT INTO im_cmmn_dt ( tbl_id, tbl_ref_id, ref_nm, bgn_dt, end_dt,
frst_reger_id, frst_reg_dt, frst_reger_ip ) VALUES ( #{tblId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tblRefId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgnDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frstRegerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATETIME, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{frstRegerIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
/* IMCmmnDtMapper.selectList */ SELECT A.tbl_id AS "tblId", A.tbl_ref_id AS "tblRefId", A.ref_nm AS "refNm", A.bgn_dt AS "bgnDt", A.end_dt AS "endDt"
FROM im_cmmn_dt A WHERE tbl_id = #{tblId} AND tbl_ref_id = #{tblRefId}
